text: Jilani (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ): “Ana nkuiona uli ayila yankuiwomba kunneka Allah? Munosyani, ana ni upandechi wetaka waigumbile? Kapena ikwete yalakweyo liunjili lyakamusyangana (najo Allah) ku mawunde? Mumbani chitabu chachapali nkanichiwe achi (cha Qur’an), kapena sigasiga sya umanyilisyi (syakutendela umboni yagalagatila isanamu), nam’baga jenumanja nkuwecheta yakuona.”
